Parameters.Name: IsDefault
Parameters.Description: Controls if this system will be set as the default. If true, missing required parameters will be allowed.

Parameters.Name: subscription
Parameters.Description: IMPORTANT: please provide a subscription id to enable dropdown functionality for various Azure resource ID parameters, such as resourcegroup_arm_id, network_arm_id, etc.

Parameters.Name: workload_zone
Parameters.Description: An existing workload zone for which the system will be deployed in. The workload zone provides the Azure Virtual Network and the Azure key vault for the system credentials.See workload zone'.

Parameters.Name: environment
Parameters.Description: Identifier for the workload zone, used for partitioning the environments. For example 'DEV', 'QA', 'PROD', 'TEST', etc.

Parameters.Name: location
Parameters.Description: The Azure region in which to deploy.

Parameters.Name: network_logical_name
Parameters.Description: Used in the naming convention and should map to the workload virtual network logical name.

Parameters.Name: name_override_file
Parameters.Description: If provided,defines a json formatted file defining the name overrides, see custom naming.

Parameters.Name: save_naming_information
Parameters.Description: If defined, will create a naming information json file for the resources, see custom naming.

Parameters.Name: custom_disk_sizes_filename
Parameters.Description: If provided,defines a json formatted file defining the custom disk sizes. See custom disk sizing.

Parameters.Name: use_prefix
Parameters.Description: Defines if a prefix will be added to the resource names. See automation naming

Parameters.Name: custom_prefix
Parameters.Description: If provided, defines the name of the custom prefix to be prepended to resources. See automation naming

Parameters.Name: use_zonal_markers
Parameters.Description: Defines if a zonal indicators will be added to the resource names. See automation naming

Parameters.Name: tags
Parameters.Description: Defines a list of tags to be applied to all resources

Parameters.Name: use_spn
Parameters.Description: If set, the deployment is performed using the Service Principal defined for the workload zone, otherwise the managed identity of the deployer is used

Parameters.Name: database_use_premium_v2_storage
Parameters.Description: Defines if the database tier will use premium v2 storage

Parameters.Name: use_scalesets_for_deployment
Parameters.Description: Defines if Flexible Virtual Machine Scale Sets are used for the deployment

Parameters.Name: scaleset_id
Parameters.Description: Azure resource identifier for Virtual Machine Scale Sets.

Parameters.Name: network_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing virtual network.

Parameters.Name: deploy_application_security_groups
Parameters.Description: Defines if application security groups will be created.

Parameters.Name: nsg_asg_with_vnet
Parameters.Description: Controls where the Application Security Groups are created.

Parameters.Name: deploy_v1_monitoring_extension
Parameters.Description: Defines if the Microsoft.AzureCAT.AzureEnhancedMonitoring extension will be deployed.

Parameters.Name: vm_disk_encryption_set_id
Parameters.Description: Azure resource identifier for custom encryption key to use for disk encryption.

Parameters.Name: user_assigned_identity_id
Parameters.Description: Azure resource identifier for User assigned identity.

Parameters.Name: upgrade_packages
Parameters.Description: Defines if the packages on the Virtual Machine will be upgraded to the latest version

Parameters.Name: use_secondary_ips
Parameters.Description: Controls if the virtual machines should be deployed with two IP addresses. Required for SAP Virtual Hostname support

Parameters.Name: dns_a_records_for_secondary_names
Parameters.Description: Defines if DNS records should be created for the virtual host names.

Parameters.Name: use_private_endpoint
Parameters.Description: Use private endpoint for the storage accounts and the key vaults in the deployment.

Parameters.Name: resourcegroup_name
Parameters.Description: Overrides the name of the resource group that will be provisioned.

Parameters.Name: resourcegroup_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Azure resource identifier for existing resource group.

Parameters.Name: proximityplacementgroup_names
Parameters.Description: Defines the names of the proximity placement groups. Only use this if the default naming is not suitable.

Parameters.Name: proximityplacementgroup_arm_ids
Parameters.Description: A list of Azure resource identifiers specifying existing proximity placement groups.

Parameters.Name: use_app_proximityplacementgroups
Parameters.Description: Defines if an proximity placement group should be used for the app tier VMs.

Parameters.Name: app_proximityplacementgroup_names
Parameters.Description: Defines the names of the app tier proximity placement groups. Only use this if the default naming is not suitable.

Parameters.Name: app_proximityplacementgroup_arm_ids
Parameters.Description: A list of Azure resource identifiers specifying existing app tier proximity placement groups.

Parameters.Name: database_platform
Parameters.Description: The type of database backend. Valid choices are 'HANA', 'DB2', 'ORACLE', 'SQLSERVER','SYBASE'

Parameters.Name: database_high_availability
Parameters.Description: Defines if the database tier is deployed highly available. When set two database servers are deployed.

Parameters.Name: database_sid
Parameters.Description: Defines the database SID.

Parameters.Name: database_server_count
Parameters.Description: Defines the number of database servers.

Parameters.Name: database_vm_image_offering
Parameters.Description: Defines the virtual machine image to use for the database servers.

Parameters.Name: database_vm_image
Parameters.Description: Defines the virtual machine image details for the database servers.

Parameters.Name: database_size
Parameters.Description: If using a custom disk sizing populate with the node name for 'db' section you have used in the file custom_disk_sizes_filename. See custom disk sizing.

Parameters.Name: database_vm_sku
Parameters.Description: If provided overrides the Virtual Machine SKU used for the database virtual machines.

Parameters.Name: database_vm_zones
Parameters.Description: Defines the availability zones in which the database servers are deployed.

Parameters.Name: database_instance_number
Parameters.Description: Defines the database instance number. Default is 00.

Parameters.Name: database_dual_nics
Parameters.Description: Defines if the database servers will have two network interfaces.

Parameters.Name: database_vm_use_DHCP
Parameters.Description: Defines if Azure subnet provided IP addresses should be used for the database servers.

Parameters.Name: database_vm_db_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: If provided, the database virtual machines will be configured with the specified IP addresses.

Parameters.Name: database_vm_db_nic_secondary_ips
Parameters.Description: If provided, the database virtual machines will be configured with the specified IP addresses as their secondary IP addresses. Needed for SAP Virtual Host support.

Parameters.Name: database_vm_admin_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: If provided, the database virtual machines will be configured with the specified IP addresses for the admin network interfaces.

Parameters.Name: database_vm_storage_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: If provided, the database tier will be configured with the specified IPs (storage subnet).

Parameters.Name: database_loadbalancer_ips
Parameters.Description: If provided, the load balancer IP addresses for the database tier's load balancer.

Parameters.Name: database_vm_authentication_type
Parameters.Description: Defines the authentication for the Database Virtual Machines. Valid options are 'Key' or 'Password'.

Parameters.Name: database_vm_avset_arm_ids
Parameters.Description: Defines a list of Azure resource identifiers for the availability sets in which to place the database virtual machines. Needed for ANF pinning scenarios.

Parameters.Name: database_use_ppg
Parameters.Description: Defines that the database virtual machines will be placed in a proximity placement group.

Parameters.Name: database_use_avset
Parameters.Description: Defines that the database virtual machines will be placed in an availability set.

Parameters.Name: database_tags
Parameters.Description: Defines a list of tags to be applied to the database server(s)

Parameters.Name: sid
Parameters.Description: Defines the SAP Application System ID.

Parameters.Name: enable_app_tier_deployment
Parameters.Description: Controls if the application tier should be deployed.

Parameters.Name: app_tier_sizing_dictionary_key
Parameters.Description: Defines the VM SKU and the disk layout for the application tier servers. Use 'Optimized' unless you have your own sizing file. See custom disk sizing

Parameters.Name: app_tier_authentication_type
Parameters.Description: Defines the authentication type for the Application tier VMs (key/password).

Parameters.Name: app_tier_use_DHCP
Parameters.Description: Defines if Azure subnet provided IP addresses should be used.

Parameters.Name: app_tier_dual_nics
Parameters.Description: Defines if the application tier servers should have two network cards.

Parameters.Name: use_loadbalancers_for_standalone_deployments
Parameters.Description: Used to control if standalone deployments (non HA) will be deployed with load balancers.

Parameters.Name: scs_server_count
Parameters.Description: Defines how many SAP Central Services servers to deploy.

Parameters.Name: scs_high_availability
Parameters.Description: Defines if SAP Central services are deployed highly available.

Parameters.Name: scs_instance_number
Parameters.Description: Defines the SCS instance number.

Parameters.Name: ers_instance_number
Parameters.Description: Defines the ERSS instance number.

Parameters.Name: scs_server_zones
Parameters.Description: Defines the availability zones in which deploy the SAP Central Services servers.

Parameters.Name: scs_server_sku
Parameters.Description: Defines the virtual machine SKU to use for the SAP Central Services servers.

Parameters.Name: scs_server_image_offering
Parameters.Description: Defines the virtual machine image to use for the SAP Central Services servers.

Parameters.Name: scs_server_image
Parameters.Description: Defines the virtual machine image to use for the SAP Central Services servers.

Parameters.Name: scs_server_app_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the SAP Central Services servers.

Parameters.Name: scs_server_nic_secondary_ips
Parameters.Description: If provided, the secondary static IP addresses for the SAP Central Services servers. Required for SAP Virtual Hostname support.

Parameters.Name: scs_server_admin_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the SAP Central Services servers secondary network interfaces.

Parameters.Name: scs_server_loadbalancer_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the SAP Central Services load balancer.

Parameters.Name: scs_server_use_avset
Parameters.Description: Defines if the SAP Central Services tier will be placed in an availability set.

Parameters.Name: scs_server_use_ppg
Parameters.Description: Defines if the Central Services will be placed in a proximity placement group.

Parameters.Name: scs_server_tags
Parameters.Description: Provides the tags to be associated to the SAP Central Services servers

Parameters.Name: application_server_count
Parameters.Description: Defines how many application servers to deploy.

Parameters.Name: application_server_zones
Parameters.Description: Defines the availability zones to which deploy the application servers.

Parameters.Name: pas_instance_number
Parameters.Description: Defines the PAS instance number.

Parameters.Name: application_server_sku
Parameters.Description: Provides the virtual machine SKU to use for the application servers.

Parameters.Name: application_server_image_offering
Parameters.Description: Define the virtual machine image for the application servers.

Parameters.Name: application_server_image
Parameters.Description: Define the virtual machine image for the application servers.

Parameters.Name: application_server_app_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the application servers.

Parameters.Name: application_server_nic_secondary_ips
Parameters.Description: If provided, the secondary static IP addresses for the application servers. Required for SAP Virtual Hostname support.

Parameters.Name: application_server_admin_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the SAP Application server's secondary network interfaces.

Parameters.Name: application_server_use_avset
Parameters.Description: If defined, the application servers will be placed in an availability set

Parameters.Name: application_server_use_ppg
Parameters.Description: If defined, the application servers will be placed in a proximity placement group.

Parameters.Name: application_server_vm_avset_arm_ids
Parameters.Description: If provided, Azure resource ids for the availability sets to use for the application servers

Parameters.Name: application_server_tags
Parameters.Description: Provides the tags to be associated to the application servers

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_count
Parameters.Description: Defines how many web dispatchers to deploy

Parameters.Name: web_sid
Parameters.Description: Web Dispatcher SID

Parameters.Name: web_instance_number
Parameters.Description: Defines the web instance number. Default is 00.

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_zones
Parameters.Description: Defines the availability zones to which deploy the web dispatchers

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_sku
Parameters.Description: Provides the virtual machine SKU to use for the web dispatchers.

Parameters.Name: web_server_image_offering
Parameters.Description: Define the virtual machine image for the web dispatchers.

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_image
Parameters.Description: Define the virtual machine image for the web dispatchers.

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_app_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the web dispatchers.

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_nic_secondary_ips
Parameters.Description: If provided, the secondary static IP addresses for the web dispatchers. Required for SAP Virtual Hostname support.

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_admin_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the web dispatcher's secondary network interfaces.

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_loadbalancer_ips
Parameters.Description: Provides the static IP addresses for the web dispatcher load balancer.

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_use_avset
Parameters.Description: If defined, the Web Dispatcher tier will be placed in an availability set

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_use_ppg
Parameters.Description: If defined, the web dispatchers will be placed in a proximity placement group

Parameters.Name: webdispatcher_server_tags
Parameters.Description: Provides the tags to be associated to the webdispatcher servers

Parameters.Name: scs_cluster_type
Parameters.Description: Cluster quorum type; AFA (Azure Fencing Agent), ASD (Azure Shared Disk), ISCSI

Parameters.Name: database_cluster_type
Parameters.Description: Cluster quorum type; AFA (Azure Fencing Agent), ASD (Azure Shared Disk), ISCSI

Parameters.Name: use_msi_for_clusters
Parameters.Description: If provided, defines that the fencing agent uses a managed identity

Parameters.Name: use_simple_mount
Parameters.Description: If provided, defines that simple mounts are used (Applicable for SLES 15 SP# or newer)

Parameters.Name: fencing_role_name
Parameters.Description: If provided, the role to assign to the managed identities

Parameters.Name: use_fence_kdump
Parameters.Description: Configure fencing device based on the fence agent fence_kdump for both SCS and DB clusters

Parameters.Name: use_fence_kdump_size_gb_db
Parameters.Description: Default size of the kdump disk which will be attached to the VMs which are part DB cluster.

Parameters.Name: use_fence_kdump_lun_db
Parameters.Description: Default LUN number of the kdump disk which will be attached to the VMs which are part of DB cluster.

Parameters.Name: use_fence_kdump_size_gb_scs
Parameters.Description: Default size of the kdump disk which will be attached to the VMs which are part of SCS cluster.

Parameters.Name: use_fence_kdump_lun_scs
Parameters.Description: Default LUN number of the kdump disk which will be attached to the VMs which are part of SCS cluster.

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Defines the admin subnet name, should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable.

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_address_prefix
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Defines the admin subnet address range. Mandatory if the subnets are not defined in the workload zone, or if existing subnets are not used.

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use as the admin subnet.

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Should only be used if the default admin network security group name is not acceptable.

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use.

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_address_prefix
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Mandatory parameter if the subnets are not defined in the workload zone, or if existing subnets are not used.

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use for the database subnet.

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Should only be used if the default database network security group name is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use.

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable.

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_address_prefix
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Mandatory parameter if the subnets are not defined in the workload zone, or if existing subnets are not used.

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use for the application subnet.

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Should only be used if the default application network security group name is not acceptable.

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use.

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_address_prefix
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Mandatory parameter if the subnets are not defined in the workload zone, or if existing subnets are not used.

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use for the web subnet.

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Should only be used if the default web network security group name is not acceptable.

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires unique subnets. Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use

Parameters.Name: automation_username
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires an unique administrator credentials. Defines the user account used by the automation, usually this is defined in the workload zone.

Parameters.Name: automation_password
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires an unique administrator credentials. Provides a password for the automation user, usually this is defined in the workload zone. If empty Terraform will create the ssh key and persist it in keyvault

Parameters.Name: automation_path_to_public_key
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires an unique administrator credentials. Provides a path to an existing ssh public key file, usually this is defined in the workload zone. If empty Terraform will create the ssh key and persist it in keyvault

Parameters.Name: automation_path_to_private_key
Parameters.Description: Use only if the SID requires an unique administrator credentials. Provides a path to an existing ssh private key file, usually this is defined in the workload zone. If empty Terraform will create the ssh key and persist it in keyvault

Parameters.Name: user_keyvault_id
Parameters.Description: If provided, the Azure resource identifier of the credentials Azure key vault, usually this is defined in the workload zone.

Parameters.Name: spn_keyvault_id
Parameters.Description: If provided, the Azure resource identifier of the deployment credential Azure key vault, usually this is defined in the workload zone.

Parameters.Name: enable_purge_control_for_keyvaults
Parameters.Description: Disables the purge protection for Azure key vaults.

Parameters.Name: NFS_provider
Parameters.Description: Defines how NFS services are provided to the SAP systems: AFS (Azure Files for NFS), ANF (Azure NetApp Files), NFS (custom solution)

Parameters.Name: sapmnt_volume_size
Parameters.Description: The volume in GB of the sapmnt file share.

Parameters.Name: azure_files_sapmnt_id
Parameters.Description: Azure resource identifier for an existing storage account used for sapmnt.

Parameters.Name: sapmnt_private_endpoint_id
Parameters.Description: Azure Resource Identifier for an private endpoint connection for the sapmnt storage account

Parameters.Name: use_random_id_for_storageaccounts
Parameters.Description: Defines if the sapmnt storage account name will have a random suffix. (this decreases the risk of name conflicts)

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_use_AVG
Parameters.Description: defines if the ANF volume(s) will be created in an Application Volume Group

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_use_Zones
Parameters.Description: defines if the ANF volume(s) will be deployed in availability zones

Parameters.Name: database_HANA_use_ANF_scaleout_scenario
Parameters.Description: If true, the database tier will be configured for scaleout scenario.

Parameters.Name: stand_by_node_count
Parameters.Description: The number of standby nodes.

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_data
Parameters.Description: If defined, will create Azure NetApp Files volume(s) for HANA data.

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_data_volume_size
Parameters.Description: If defined, provides the size of the HANA data volume(s) in GB.

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_data_volume_throughput
Parameters.Description: If defined, provides the throughput of the HANA data volume(s) in MB/s.

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_data_use_existing_volume
Parameters.Description: Use existing Azure NetApp volumes for HANA data.

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_data_volume_name
Parameters.Description: Azure NetApp volumes name(s) for existing HANA data volume(s)

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_data_volume_count
Parameters.Description: Number of ANF Data Volumes

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_log
Parameters.Description: If defined, will create Azure NetApp Files volume(s) for HANA log.

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_log_volume_size
Parameters.Description: If defined, provides the size of the HANA log volume(s) in GB.

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_log_volume_throughput
Parameters.Description: If defined, provides the throughput of the HANA log volume(s) in MB/s.

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_log_use_existing
Parameters.Description: Use existing Azure NetApp volumes for HANA log.

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_log_volume_name
Parameters.Description: Azure NetApp volumes name(s) for existing HANA log volume(s)

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_data_volume_count
Parameters.Description: Number of ANF Data Volumes

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_shared
Parameters.Description: If defined, will create Azure NetApp Files volume(s) for HANA shared.

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_shared_volume_size
Parameters.Description: If defined, provides the size of the HANA shared volume(s) in GB.

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_shared_volume_throughput
Parameters.Description: If defined, provides the throughput of the HANA shared volume(s) in MB/s.

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_shared_use_existing
Parameters.Description: Use existing Azure NetApp volumes for HANA shared.

Parameters.Name: ANF_HANA_shared_volume_name
Parameters.Description: Azure NetApp volumes name(s) for existing HANA shared volume(s)

Parameters.Name: ANF_usr_sap
Parameters.Description: If defined, will create Azure NetApp Files volume(s) for /usr/sap

Parameters.Name: ANF_usr_sap_volume_size
Parameters.Description: If defined, provides the size for the /usr/sap volume in GB

Parameters.Name: ANF_usr_sap_throughput
Parameters.Description: If defined provides the throughput of the /usr/sap volume in MB/s.

Parameters.Name: ANF_usr_sap_use_existing
Parameters.Description: Use existing  /usr/sap volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_usr_sap_volume_name
Parameters.Description: Azure NetApp volumes name(s) for existing /usr/sap volume(s)

Parameters.Name: ANF_sapmnt_volume_size
Parameters.Description: If defined, provides the size for the sapmnt volume in GB.

Parameters.Name: ANF_sapmnt_volume_throughput
Parameters.Description: If defined, provides the throughput for the sapmnt volume in MB/s.

Parameters.Name: ANF_sapmnt
Parameters.Description: Use existing sapmnt volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_sapmnt_use_clone_in_secondary_zone
Parameters.Description: Use clone in secondary region for sapmnt volume

Parameters.Name: ANF_sapmnt_volume_name
Parameters.Description: Azure NetApp volumes name(s) for existing HANA /sapmnt volume(s)

Parameters.Name: deploy_anchor_vm
Parameters.Description: Controls if an anchor Virtual Machine should be deployed

Parameters.Name: anchor_vm_sku
Parameters.Description: Defines the virtual machine SKU for the Anchor Virtual Machine

Parameters.Name: anchor_vm_authentication_username
Parameters.Description: Defines the username for the Anchor Virtual Machine

Parameters.Name: anchor_vm_authentication_type
Parameters.Description: Defines the authentication type for the Anchor Virtual Machine

Parameters.Name: anchor_vm_accelerated_networking
Parameters.Description: Defines if the anchor Virtual Machine should use accelerated networking.

Parameters.Name: anchor_vm_image_offering
Parameters.Description: Virtual machine image for the anchor virtual machine.

Parameters.Name: anchor_vm_image
Parameters.Description: Virtual machine image for the anchor virtual machine.

Parameters.Name: anchor_vm_nic_ips
Parameters.Description: Provide the IP address for the the Anchor Virtual Machines

Parameters.Name: anchor_vm_use_DHCP
Parameters.Description: Defines if Azure subnet provided IP addresses should be used.

Parameters.Name: ams_resource_id
Parameters.Description: Defines the Azure resource id for the Log analytics workspace in AMS

Parameters.Name: enable_ha_monitoring
Parameters.Description: Enables prometheus high availability cluster monitoring.

Parameters.Name: enable_os_monitoring
Parameters.Description: Enable prometheus operating system level monitoring.

Parameters.Name: resource_offset
Parameters.Description: Provides an offset for resource naming.

Parameters.Name: bom_name
Parameters.Description: This is the Bill of Materials name for the SAP Application to be deployed.

Parameters.Name: configuration_settings
Parameters.Description: This is dictionary of values that can be used to add values to the sap-parameters file
